pli-tv-pvr1.7:0.2_0: The Analysis of a monk deserving to analysis ofMendicant
pli-tv-pvr1.7:0.4_0: and win on the near shore.
pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.1_0: Before he has sexual intercourse, he continues to make seven principles,
pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.2_0: Examination, seven principles that prevent decline:
pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.3_0: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass. ...
pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.1_0: Or out of disrespect, a nun should defecate, urinate, or spit in water, or spit on even level ground?
pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water three times, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.3_0: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr1.7:3.1_0: The seventh section consisting of the communal recitation is finished.
